product_name: PowerTap G3 Power Meter Hub - Shimano
long_description: A lightweight instrument to improve performance, the PowerTap G3 Power Meter hub for Shimano components measures how hard you pedal and transmits the data to an ANT+ compatible device for analysis.
short_description: A lightweight instrument to improve performance, the PowerTap G3 Power Meter hub for Shimano components measures how hard you pedal and transmits the data to an ANT+ compatible device for analysis.
